name: Rich Green Bean Casserole
author: HEATHERWIDNER
summary: If you like rich casseroles you'll love this!! Green beans are baked in a creamy cheese sauce with a zesty seasoning.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place the processed cheese into a large microwave-safe bowl along with the cream of chicken soup
Heat on full power for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until cheese is melted
Season with salt, pepper, and Cajun seasoning
Pour into a 1 1/2 quart casserole dish, and sprinkle the French fried onions over the top
Bake for about 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the top is crispy
